text: Crassispira logani is an extinct species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pseudomelatomidae, the turrids and allies.Fossilworks: Drillia logani Fossils have been found in Miocene strata in Kerala, India, age range: 23.03 to 15.97 Ma. ==References== * A. K. Dey. 1961. The Miocene Mollusca from Quilon, Kerala (India). Palaeontologica Indica 36 ==External links== * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Crassispira logani logani Category:Gastropods described in 1961
title: Crassispira logani
